sgym.title: Street Gym
sgym.desc: High-intensity strength circuits in which strength and endurance are the main focus. This activity is carried out in a single location.

ohiit.title: Outside Hiit
ohiit.desc: Strength training is combined with different physical challenges and displacements. These sessions are designed to take place in different locations.

irun.title: Interval Running
irun.desc: Sessions designed to work on heart-lung capacity and the strength and endurance of the lower body. It consists of a running session in which we will work with intensity intervals.

prep.title: Routine preparation
prep.desc: The first step in preparing new routines is an interview. This initial interview allows us to get to know the client better, what are his objectives, what is his availability, what are the things that motivate him, etc. With all this information we proceed to prepare a first routine. The routines can be changed every one, two or three months, depending on the objectives and capabilities.

moni.title: Follow-up and adaptations
moni.desc: Regardless of the service required, follow-up and adaptation will be fundamental. Every week, meetings or video calls are held to discuss how the week has gone, to talk about progress, to find out the client's feelings and to be able to give and receive feedback on the sessions carried out. The adaptation section refers to these sensations and feedback, as thanks to these meetings we can find out how to adapt future sessions as best as possible.

coach.title: Backing and coaching
coach.desc: It has been proven that training accompanied brings many benefits to our sessions. That is why there is always the possibility of training with a personal trainer who will help us with the different stances, correct the execution techniques and who will be there to motivate us and make the sessions as efficient as possible.

personal.title: Personal Training
personal.subtitle: La personalización nos caracteriza, nuestro servicio estrella…

couple.title: Couple Training
couple.subtitle: ¿Tienes alguien con quien entrenar? Nosotros os entrenamos de manera personalizada…

group.title: Group Sessions
group.subtitle: La motivación del grupo ayuda a superar tus metas

online.title: Online Advice
online.subtitle: Nos adaptamos al material y lugar de entreno disponible. Aqui estamos para ayudarte estés donde estés y tengas el material que tengas!

perks.routine: Plan de entreno personalizado y adaptable
perks.location: Entrenamiento en el exterior/interior, tu eliges el lugar
perks.whatsapp: Soporte por Whatsapp disponible cuando lo necesites
perks.couple: Entrenos adaptados para hacer en pareja

personalize.title: Servicios personalizados
personalize.desc: Te ofrecemos una amplia gama de servicios para amoldarnos a tus necesidades, en los que acompañado siempre de tu entrenador personal, podrás conseguir tus objetivos, algunos tan demandados como, perder grasa, ganar masa muscular, tonificar y modelar tu cuerpo o simplemente tener un mínimo de actividad física, tan necesaria para nuestra salud.

routine.title: Routine preparation
routine.desc: The first step in preparing new routines is an interview. This initial interview allows us to get to know the client better, what are his objectives, what is his availability, what are the things that motivate him, etc. With all this information we proceed to prepare a first routine. The routines can be changed every one, two or three months, depending on the objectives and capabilities.

Every week, meetings or video calls are held to discuss how the week has gone, to talk about progress, to find out the client's feelings and to be able to give and receive feedback on the sessions carried out. The adaptation section refers to these sensations and feedback, as thanks to these meetings we can find out how to adapt future sessions as best as possible.

meet.title: Let's meet
meet.desc1: If you wish to talk face to face don't hesitate to send us a message or to call us and we will set up a meeting.
meet.desc2: We will set up a meeting place and time.

chat.title: Let's chat
chat.desc: If you prefer to talk without commitments you can send us a message via:

follow.title: Follow us
follow.desc: If you are not yet convinced, follow us to know more about us:

whatsapp.message2: Hi, I'd like to know more
